title: Microsoft’s $357 Billion Rout Is Worst Since Deepseek Hit Nvidia
description: Microsoft Corp. shares got caught up in a selloff Thursday that wiped out $357 billion in value, second-largest for a single session in stock market history.
content: Microsoft Corp. shares got caught up in a selloff Thursday that wiped out $357 billion in value, second-largest for a single session in stock market history.
